Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-48795 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 0.59.0-26
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-48795 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 0.59.0-26. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package kubevirt is earlier than 0.59.0-26, affected by CVE-2023-48795
